This is MC 1.18.2, which unfortunately means you won't be able to battle the Harbinger.
High DPS output. It also doesn't help when the laser beam of death ignores most of your armor!
This is MC 1.18.2, which unfortunately means you won't be able to battle the Leviathan.
L_Ender is currently working on this boss but has extensively released teasers. Good luck on the underwater boss battle!
